abstract: NHL bars Philadelphia Flyers forward Brayden Schenn for first three games of 2017 NHL season for high hit on Washington Capitals winger T J Oshie during playoff game.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. barred Philadelphia forward Brayden Schenn for the first three games of next season for a high hit on Washington’s T. J. Oshie on Sunday.
snippet: The N.H.L. barred Philadelphia forward Brayden Schenn for the first three games of next season for a high hit on Washington’s T. J. Oshie on Sunday.
